thread.section_title: Servcorp Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servcorp | servcorp.com.au
thread.title: Greg Harman

author: Greg Harman
title: Greg Harman
text:
I have been with Servcorp Market Street, Sydney for 9 years. As a virtual client the staff at Servcorp have always been professional, polite and welcoming. They are lovely people too and are always there to help me.
When I started with them, my Animation Studio in New Zealand was only 3 staff. Today we have a 2 floor facility in downtown Wellington hiring over 50 crew and my business couldn't be healthier.
More recently I have taken up floor space at Market Street and the office is perfect for my needs, with a great view of the Sydney Tower and Harbour which definitely helps as I work through my daily calls.
Servcorp gets my highest recommendation. Thanks for everything.
